title: Sherlock Holmes faces death. Sherlock Holmes' secret weapon. Shelock Holmes and the voice of terror.
creator_credit: Universal Pictures, Roy William Neill and John Rawlins
brief_description: Three classic Holmes stories in this one compilation features Basil Rathbone as Sherlock Holmes and Nigel Bruce as Dr. Watson. Holmes, created by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, uses his powers of observation to outwit daring criminals. In this series of films, made during World War 2, Holmes and Watson played out their adventures in a contemporary setting defeating evil Nazis, traitors and dastardly villains.
